```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(mapview)
library(flexdashboard)
library(gt)
```


```{r}
#load SIMD data and shapefiles 
#age 90 is for 90 years and older!

age_all <- read_csv(here("data", "sape-2018-persons.csv"))

age_f <- read_csv(here("data", "sape-2018-females.csv"))

age_m <- read_csv(here("data", "sape-2018-males.csv"))

datazone_sf <- st_read(here("data", "sc_dz_11.shp"), quiet = T)
```

```{r}
#summarise age bands

```



```{r}
#select Aberdeen City areas' data 
#join to shapefile

aberdeen_age_all <-
  age_all %>%
  filter(council_area == "Aberdeen City")

aberdeen_data_zones <- pull(aberdeen_age_all, data_zone)

aberdeen_sf <- filter(datazone_sf, DataZone %in% aberdeen_data_zones)

aberdeen_sf <-
  merge(aberdeen_sf, aberdeen_age_all, by.x = "DataZone", by.y = "data_zone")

```

```{r}
aberdeen_sf %>% 
  mapview(

    label = aberdeen_sf$name,
    layer.name = "population (%)")
```

```{r}

aberdeen_age_all %>%
  filter( >= 30) %>%
  arrange(Intermediate_Zone) %>%
  gt() %>%
  tab_header(title = "Most overcrowded", subtitle = "Areas with at least 30% living in overcrowded homes") %>%
  cols_label(Data_Zone = "Data Zone", Intermediate_Zone = "Area", Total_population = "Population", overcrowded_rate = "Overcrowded (%)")
```
